channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.8
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 10.21 with PostGIS 2.4.10
  • PostgreSQL 11.16 with PostGIS 2.5.6
  • PostgreSQL 12.11 with PostGIS 3.0.5
  • PostgreSQL 13.7 with PostGIS 3.1.5
  • PostgreSQL 14.4 with PostGIS 3.2.1

There was a bug in PostgreSQL 14.3 and earlier that may lead to corrupted indexes in some cases. We recommend to reindex all databases after upgrading to PostgreSQL 14.4 as a precaution.
